thread.title: White Nationalist Richard Spencer Tried To Troll Aziz Ansari, Got Obliterated By Twitter For His Effort
thread.title_full: White Nationalist Richard Spencer Tried To Troll Aziz Ansari, Got Obliterated By Twitter For His Effort

author: Douglas Charles
title: White Nationalist Richard Spencer Tried To Troll Aziz Ansari, Got Obliterated By Twitter For His Effort
text:
While hosting Saturday Night Live this past, uh Saturday, Aziz Ansari delivered an opening monologue which took aim at a number of political topics.
You can watch the whole thing above, it’s quite good, and one of the topics Ansari hit on (pun interned as you will see) was the alt-right movement…
“The problem is, there’s a new group… I’m talking about these people that, as soon as Trump won, they’re like, ‘We don’t have to pretend like we’re not racist anymore! We don’t have to pretend anymore! We can be racist again! Whoo! You know who I’m talking about. There’s like this new lower-case K.K.K. movement that started. This kind of casual white supremacy.”
Afterwards, White Nationalist Richard Spencer thought it would be funny to try to troll Ansari with a tweet saying, “It seems like we really triggered you.”
. @azizansari 
It seems like we really triggered you? #AltRight https://t.co/2TxQs840rS 
— Richard Spencer (@RichardBSpencer) January 22, 2017 

Considering that on Friday Spencer got punched in the face on live TV at A Trump protest, some people on Twitter thought that perhaps it was he who had, in fact, been “triggered.” 
the academy award for best picture goes to "richard spencer getting punched in his smug nazi face midway through explaining pepe the frog" pic.twitter.com/NRzom6jcWK 
— Glen Coco (@MrPooni) January 21, 2017 

And by some people, I mean, dozens upon dozens upon dozens… and they all had one VERY common theme.
@RichardBSpencer everyone saw you cry on TV
— Patrick Monahan (@pattymo) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer everyone saw you cry on tv
— Joe Berkowitz (@JoeBerkowitz) January 23, 2017 


@JoeBerkowitz @AutismSoon i think one of you is supposed to cry on tv iirc
— eric limer (@ericlimer) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer @azizansari @YouTube Everyone saw you cry on TV, Richard, and it was pretty funny imho
— J Crowley (@jdcrowley) January 23, 2017 
. @RichardBSpencer @azizansari Everyone saw you cry on TV. You didn't even get to talk about your frog pin. You just held your face and cried
— Sean O'Neal (@seanoneal) January 23, 2017 
@seanoneal @MeetMeAtTapps @RichardBSpencer @azizansari haha i just went a few minutes without thinking about richard spencer getting punched
— jason (@JasonKirkSBN) January 23, 2017 
. @RichardBSpencer Everyone saw you cry on tv.
— Theodore Leo (@tedleo) January 23, 2017 


. @RichardBSpencer Something tells me we're going to be seeing you cry a lot more. pic.twitter.com/bCfEKDP4w7 
— Heather Whaley (@HeatherWhaley) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer @azizansari Richard everyone saw you cry on TV
— K. Thor Jensen (@kthorjensen) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer everyone saw you cry on tv
— Timothy Simons (@timothycsimons) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer dude, everyone saw you cry on TV
— keithlaw (@keithlaw) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer everyone saw you cry on tv
— Astro Upulie (@upulie) January 23, 2017 


@RichardBSpencer everyone saw you cry on tv
— Ketan Joshi (@KetanJ0) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer @azizansari I've cried, but not on tv and not everyone saw it.
— Lindsay McDowens (@doctormcdougall) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer everyone saw you cry on tv
— Alex Perry (@Yelix) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer @azizansari @YouTube you cried on tv
— Baby Lady (@caitlinstasey) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer Are you ok hun? It's just that everyone saw you cry on tv.
— Aaron Gilbert (@AaronDelays) January 23, 2017 


@RichardBSpencer you're the dude who cried on TV
— Alex Kruglov (@akruglov) January 23, 2017 

It pretty much just goes on like that forever.
Meanwhile, our girl Chrissy Teigen somehow got involved in a Twitter discussion with Spencer on Monday…
@RichardBSpencer you became someone who was punched in the face
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 23, 2017 
@RichardBSpencer you are literally a nazi. I don't even need to come up with a comeback. Really takes the pressure off. Thanks, nazi!
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 23, 2017 
Hey guys, just conversing with a literal nazi over here wyd
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 23, 2017 
Nothing I could say will piss him off more than the fact I have a black/asian/white baby. Life is grand.
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 23, 2017 

Awesome.
H/T The Daily Dot
